intro_only_event_multi_ch0286_ch0287_log:
We’d like you to get to know our friends a little
better today, [Name:PlayerNickname ], so...
We created a little series! It’s called...
Juliana and Florian’s...
Super Exclusive Secrets!

It’s a series where we have our friends share
little-known facts about themselves!
So let’s get into it! Here’s our friend for today!
I’m Nemona! I absolutely love Pokémon battling!

Let’s dive in and have Nemona tell us something
we can only learn here!
Hmm, let’s see...

I’m actually crummy when it comes to catching
Pokémon. Have I shared that already?

I think you have. There anything else you
struggle with?
Hmm... Oh! I know!
Arven had to tell me about measuring spoons!
Huh? Measuring spoons?

Yeah. People have different ideas how much a
tablespoon is, for example.

So when I learned there’s a tool to measure it,
it was a real eye-opener!

By the way, how much is a tablespoon to you,
Nemona?
A whooole lot!
I’m glad Arven taught you the basics...

And that was Nemona, whose tablespoon is
Champion Rank!

We’ll invite another friend of ours tomorrow,
so come back again!
Juliana and Florian’s...
Super Exclusive Secrets!
Which one of our friends is here today?
H-hi... It’s me, Penny, the Veevee enthusiast...

Let’s dive in and have Penny tell us something we
can only learn here!

Um... I could talk about a special dish Team Star
came up with on Pasio?
Huh? There’s such a thing?
Yup. It’s called Starf Curry.
We put in Starf Berries to make it super rich.

Those Berries are considered a myth, so you can
imagine how great they taste!
Wow, that sounds so good! I’m getting hungry!

And that was Penny, who cares about
curry flavors!
Hope to see you again tomorrow!
Juliana and Florian’s...
Super Exclusive Secrets!

It’s the final day! Which friend is here for
us today?
It’s Juliana and Florian’s best bud, trusty ol’ Arven!
Hey, Arven! I wanna eat something yummy!
Penny’s secret yesterday made us real hungry.

Leave it to me! I’ll whip up plenty of grub
after this!

OK, let’s have Arven tell us something we can only
learn here!

Hmmm. I’m sure you’ve already talked enough
about truly secret-y stuff.
Oh, how about this?
Trusty Arven’s scary secret!
Oooh, do tell!
Ehh...
Sure thing! It goes like this...

If you don’t eat your vegetables...your insides will
get all goopy!
What?! Is that true?
Yep! I read it in a book!

I guess it might NOT be healthy to eat an
unbalanced diet...
So don’t be picky! A message from Arven!

That’s the end of Juliana and Florian’s Super
Exclusive Secrets! Did you like them?

Hope we get to hear about your friends next time,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
